item.title: 英国北海油气供应链对能源转型至关重要
item.description: 参加今年在阿伯丁举行的欧洲近海会议的代表们担心，英国北海的财政和监管不确定性可能会使当地历史悠久的供应链成为牺牲品。【原文：Delegates at this year's Offshore Europe conference in Aberdeen have voiced concerns that the long-established local supply chain could be a victim of fiscal and regulatory uncertainty in the UK North Sea】

item.description: 3/24 号区块发现了五个油田和一个废弃油田，可与邻近的 3/05 号区块的生产平台相连接。【原文：Block 3/24 holds five discoveries - and an abandoned oilfield - that could be tied back to production platforms in adjacent Block 3/05】
